contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Candyass | Type = studio | Artist = [[Orgy (band)|Orgy]] | Cover = Candyass.jpg | Released = August 18, 1998 | Recorded = Donner Pass Cabin, [[Truckee, California]];<br />N.R.G. Studios, [[North Hollywood, California]];<br />Josh's Garage, [[Hollywood, California]];<br />Westlake Audio, [[West Hollywood, California]] | Genre = [[Industrial rock]], [[industrial metal]], [[alternative metal]] | Length = 48:10 | Label = [[Warner Brothers]]/[[Reprise Records]]/[[Elementree Records]] | Producer = [[Josh Abraham]]; [[Orgy (band)|Orgy]] | Last album = | This album = ''Candyass''<br />(1998) | Next album = ''[[Vapor Transmission]]''<br />(2000) }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1score = {{Rating|3|5}}<ref>[{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r371964|pure_url=yes}} Allmusic review]</ref> |rev2 = [[Robert Christgau]] |rev2score = {{Rating-Christgau|dud}}<ref>[http://www.robertchristgau.com/get_artist.php?name=orgy Robert Christgau review]</ref> }}<!-- Automatically generated by DASHBot--> '''''Candyass''''' is the debut [[album]] of the [[alternative metal]] band [[Orgy (band)|Orgy]]. It was released on August 18, 1998. == Track listing == # "Social Enemies" – 4:05 # "[[Stitches/Dissention|Stitches]]" – 3:18 # "Dissention" – 3:31 # "Platinum" – 3:42 # "Fetisha" – 4:02 # "Fiend" – 4:29 # "[[Blue Monday (New Order song)#Unofficial remixes and cover versions|Blue Monday]]" – 4:26 # "Gender" – 4:27 # "All the Same" – 4:05 # "Pantomime" – 4:28 # "Revival" – 4:09 # "Dizzy" – 3:21 == Singles == * "Blue Monday" Release Date: February 9, 1999<ref>[http://www.amazon.com/Blue-Monday-Stitches-Orgy/dp/B00000I7FN/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=music&qid=1246937845&sr=1-1 "Amazon.com: Blue Monday / Stitches: Orgy: Music"]</ref> * "Stitches" Release Date: November 23, 1999<ref>[http://www.amazon.com/Stitches-Orgy/dp/B00003A9PZ/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=music&qid=1246937806&sr=1-1 "Amazon.com: Stitches / Dissention: Orgy: Music"]</ref> == Personnel == * [[Jay Gordon]] - vocals, programming, additional synthesizers * Bobby Hewitt - drums * [[Paige Haley]] - bass guitar * [[Ryan Shuck]] - guitars * [[Amir Derakh]] - additional engineering, guitars * Chad Fridirici - engineering, mixing on ''Gender'', pro-tool editing * [[Josh Abraham]] - production, additional engineering, programming, additional synthesizers * [[Dave Ogilvie]] - mixing * [[David Kahne]] - mixing on ''Stiches'', ''Fetisha'' * [[Jay Baumgardner]] - mixing on ''Pantomime'' * Tom Baker - mastering * Brian Virtue - assistant engineer * Cope Till - assistant engineer * Doug Trantow - assistant engineer * Anthony Valcic - programming * [[Jonathan Davis]] - additional vocals on ''Revival'' * [[Elijah Blue Allman]] - additional vocals on ''Revival'', additional synthesizers * [[Troy Van Leeuwen]] - additional guitars on ''Social Enemies'' and ''Dissention'' * Steve Gerdes - art direction, design * [[Joseph Cultice]] - photography == References == {{Reflist}} {{Orgy}} [[Category:Orgy (band) albums]] [[Category:1998 debut albums]] [[Category:Reprise Records albums]] [[Category:Warner Bros. Records albums]] [[Category:Albums produced by Josh Abraham]]
